kids_easy.definition: A small pet animal that says meow.
kids_easy.sentence: The cat naps on the rug.

kids_easy.definition: A pet animal that can bark.
kids_easy.sentence: My dog runs to the gate.

kids_easy.definition: The bright star that gives us light.
kids_easy.sentence: The sun is warm at noon.

kids_easy.definition: Something you wear on your head.
kids_easy.sentence: I wear a hat in the rain.
I jump into bed at night.

kids_easy.definition: A picture that shows where places are.
kids_easy.sentence: We use a map to find the park.

kids_easy.definition: To move fast on your feet.
A small container for a drink.
kids_easy.sentence: The cup is full of milk.

kids_easy.definition: A tool used to write words.
kids_easy.sentence: I sign my name with a pen.

kids_easy.definition: A farm animal with a curly tail.
A big vehicle that carries many people.
kids_easy.sentence: The bus stops near my house.

kids_easy.definition: A sweet fruit spread for bread.

kids_middle.definition: A round fruit that can be red or green.
kids_middle.sentence: I packed an apple for lunch.

kids_middle.definition: A white or gray shape in the sky.
kids_middle.sentence: A dark cloud covered the sun.

kids_middle.definition: A happy look on your face.
A large stream of flowing water.
kids_middle.sentence: We skipped stones in the river.

kids_middle.definition: A long vehicle that moves on tracks.

kids_middle.sentence: Turn on the light in the hall.

kids_middle.definition: To move your body to music.
A tale about people or events.
kids_middle.sentence: Grandma read a story before bed.

kids_middle.definition: A living thing that grows in soil.
kids_middle.sentence: The plant needs water each day.

kids_middle.definition: A baked food made from flour.

kids_middle.sentence: I feel happy when we play outside.

kids_advanced.definition: Giving off a lot of light or looking smart.
kids_advanced.sentence: The bright lamp lit the room.

kids_advanced.definition: Showing courage in a hard moment.
kids_advanced.sentence: She was brave during the storm.

kids_advanced.definition: A game where pieces fit together.
kids_advanced.sentence: We finished the puzzle at the table.
Use a gentle touch with the kitten.

kids_advanced.definition: To go from one place to another.
kids_advanced.sentence: We travel to see our cousins.

kids_advanced.definition: A thick forest in a warm place.
kids_advanced.sentence: Many animals live in the jungle.

kids_advanced.definition: Wanting to learn or know more.

kids_advanced.sentence: I can balance on one foot.

kids_advanced.definition: The season or act of gathering crops.
kids_advanced.sentence: Farmers harvest corn in the fall.

kids_advanced.definition: To shine with small flashes of light.
To travel and learn about a place.
kids_advanced.sentence: We explore the trail after lunch.

adult_elementary.definition: A regular way of doing things.
adult_elementary.sentence: I follow a morning routine before work.

adult_elementary.definition: To look at two things and notice differences and similarities.
To have something as part of a whole.
adult_elementary.sentence: The fee will include all materials.

adult_elementary.definition: A planned way to do a task.
An important part or function of something.
adult_elementary.sentence: Search is a useful feature in the app.
You have the option to cancel anytime.
We made a budget for the trip.

adult_elementary.definition: To find the size, amount, or degree of something.
adult_elementary.sentence: Please measure the width of the desk.

adult_elementary.definition: The situation around something that helps explain it.
adult_elementary.sentence: The quote makes sense in context.

adult_elementary.definition: A short version of the main points.
adult_elementary.sentence: He wrote a summary of the article.
Daily reading is a major benefit for students.

adult_intermediate.sentence: Please provide accurate numbers in the report.
The market is dynamic this quarter.

adult_intermediate.definition: To examine something carefully in detail.
adult_intermediate.sentence: We analyze data before making a decision.

adult_intermediate.definition: To control something by rules or limits.
adult_intermediate.sentence: The agency can regulate harmful products.

adult_intermediate.definition: To keep something going over time.
Reasonable and based on clear thinking.
adult_intermediate.sentence: Her plan is logical and easy to follow.
The contrast between both designs is obvious.

adult_intermediate.definition: To make something as effective as possible.
adult_intermediate.sentence: We optimize the page for faster loading.

adult_intermediate.definition: To explain the meaning of something.
adult_intermediate.sentence: Experts interpret the test results differently.

adult_intermediate.definition: Able to change easily when needed.
adult_intermediate.sentence: A flexible schedule helps busy parents.

adult_intermediate.definition: Able to be trusted to work well every time.
adult_intermediate.sentence: Choose a reliable source for medical facts.

adult_intermediate.definition: A plan designed to achieve a goal.

adult_advanced.sentence: Smartphones are ubiquitous in modern cities.

adult_advanced.definition: Focused on practical results rather than theory alone.
adult_advanced.sentence: She offered a pragmatic solution to the conflict.

adult_advanced.definition: Very careful and precise about details.
adult_advanced.sentence: His meticulous notes made auditing easier.

adult_advanced.definition: To reduce the seriousness of something harmful.
adult_advanced.sentence: Early warnings can mitigate flood damage.

adult_advanced.definition: Fluent and persuasive in speaking or writing.
adult_advanced.sentence: The speaker gave an eloquent closing argument.

adult_advanced.definition: Able to recover quickly from difficulty.
adult_advanced.sentence: Resilient teams adapt to sudden change.

adult_advanced.definition: A model or pattern for how something is understood.
adult_advanced.sentence: Cloud computing changed the software paradigm.

adult_advanced.definition: A combination of ideas into a coherent whole.
adult_advanced.sentence: Her paper offered a synthesis of prior research.

adult_advanced.definition: Open to more than one interpretation.
Very impressive, powerful, or difficult to deal with.
adult_advanced.sentence: They faced a formidable legal challenge.

adult_advanced.definition: Able to express ideas clearly and effectively.
adult_advanced.sentence: She is articulate in both debate and writing.
